languages.text: "Нет. Изначально мне был присвоен статус {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкера{/g}, годного для службы в {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Имперской гвардии{/g}, где я и провел несколько лет. Лишь позже я стал агентом {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}". {n}Хейнрикс умолкает, явно не намереваясь продолжать рассказ.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Нет. Изначально мне был присвоен статус {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкера{/g}, годного для службы в {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Имперской гвардии{/g}, где я и провел несколько лет. Лишь позже я стал агентом {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}". {n}Хейнрикс умолкает, явно не намереваясь продолжать рассказ.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "No. First, I was accorded the status of a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} fit for service in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}, where I then spent several years. It was only afterward that I became an agent of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}." {n}Heinrix stops there, clearly not intending to elaborate further.{/n}

It was only afterward that I became an agent of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}." {n}Heinrix stops there, clearly not intending to elaborate further.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “并没有。我先是去了{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国卫队{/g}，在那里以{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}的身份服役。我在卫队里呆了好几年，在那之后才成为{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的代理人。”{n}海因里希停了下来。很显然，关于这个问题，他并不打算多说下去。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. First, I was accorded the status of a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} fit for service in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}, where I then spent several years. It was only afterward that I became an agent of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}." {n}Heinrix stops there, clearly not intending to elaborate further.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “并没有。我先是去了{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国卫队{/g}，在那里以{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}的身份服役。我在卫队里呆了好几年，在那之后才成为{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的代理人。”{n}海因里希停了下来。很显然，关于这个问题，他并不打算多说下去。{/n}

languages.original_text: "No. First, I was accorded the status of a psyker fit for service in the Imperial Guard, where I then spent several years. It was only afterward that I became an agent of the Golden Throne." {n}Heinrix stops there, clearly not intending to elaborate further.{/n}

languages.text: «No. Primero, se me otorgó la categoría de {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquico{/g} preparado para el servicio en la {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Guardia Imperial{/g}, donde pasé varios años. No me convertí en agente del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g} hasta más tarde». {n}Heinrix termina la historia ahí, sin intención de dar más detalles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. First, I was accorded the status of a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} fit for service in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}, where I then spent several years. It was only afterward that I became an agent of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}." {n}Heinrix stops there, clearly not intending to elaborate further.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No. Primero, se me otorgó la categoría de {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquico{/g} preparado para el servicio en la {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Guardia Imperial{/g}, donde pasé varios años. No me convertí en agente del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g} hasta más tarde». {n}Heinrix termina la historia ahí, sin intención de dar más detalles.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「いいや、まず{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}としての立場を与えられ、そこで数年を過ごした。{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}のエージェントになったのは、その後だ」{n}ハインリックスはそこで言葉を止めた。それ以上踏み込むことはないのは明らかだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. First, I was accorded the status of a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} fit for service in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}, where I then spent several years. It was only afterward that I became an agent of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}." {n}Heinrix stops there, clearly not intending to elaborate further.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「いいや、まず{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}としての立場を与えられ、そこで数年を過ごした。{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}のエージェントになったのは、その後だ」{n}ハインリックスはそこで言葉を止めた。それ以上踏み込むことはないのは明らかだった。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Nein. Zunächst wurde mir der Status eines {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psionikers{/g} verliehen, der für den Dienst in der {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperialen Armee{/g} geeignet ist. Dort verbrachte ich mehrere Jahre. Erst danach wurde ich zum Agenten des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g}." {n}Heinrix verstummt. Offenbar hat er nicht vor, das noch weiter auszuführen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. First, I was accorded the status of a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} fit for service in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}, where I then spent several years. It was only afterward that I became an agent of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}." {n}Heinrix stops there, clearly not intending to elaborate further.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Zunächst wurde mir der Status eines {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psionikers{/g} verliehen, der für den Dienst in der {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperialen Armee{/g} geeignet ist. Dort verbrachte ich mehrere Jahre. Erst danach wurde ich zum Agenten des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g}." {n}Heinrix verstummt. Offenbar hat er nicht vor, das noch weiter auszuführen.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Non. On m'a d'abord attribué le statut de {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} apte au service et j'ai été affecté à la {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Garde Impériale{/g} pendant plusieurs années. Ce n'est que plus tard que je suis devenu un agent du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}. » {n}Heinrix s'arrête là, visiblement décidé à ne pas en dire plus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. First, I was accorded the status of a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} fit for service in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}, where I then spent several years. It was only afterward that I became an agent of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}." {n}Heinrix stops there, clearly not intending to elaborate further.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Non. On m'a d'abord attribué le statut de {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} apte au service et j'ai été affecté à la {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Garde Impériale{/g} pendant plusieurs années. Ce n'est que plus tard que je suis devenu un agent du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}. » {n}Heinrix s'arrête là, visiblement décidé à ne pas en dire plus.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Yok. Önce {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}İmparatorluk Muhafızları{/g} bünyesinde hizmete elverişli bir {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g} yapıldım, yıllarımı orada geçirdim. {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht'ın{/g} hizmetkârı oluşum sonrasındadır." {n}Heinrix, bu noktada duruyor. Daha fazla anlatmak istemediği belli oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. First, I was accorded the status of a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} fit for service in the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}, where I then spent several years. It was only afterward that I became an agent of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}." {n}Heinrix stops there, clearly not intending to elaborate further.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yok. Önce {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}İmparatorluk Muhafızları{/g} bünyesinde hizmete elverişli bir {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g} mevkisine getirildim, yıllarımı orada geçirdim. {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g}'ın hizmetkârı oluşum, ondan sonra." {n}Heinrix, bu noktada duruyor. Daha konuşmak istemediği belli oluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
